summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, regarding media reporting about overtime shifts worked by officers, likely in relation to the Jeffrey Epstein case. The sender requests confirmation of exact records for one officer who was mandated and another who worked five straight days of overtime.

persons.name: Mil
persons.context: Recipient of an email requesting confirmation of overtime shift records for officers.

events.title: Email about officer overtime shifts
events.description: An email is sent regarding media reporting on overtime shifts worked by officers, with a request to confirm exact records.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 12, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
It references media reporting about overtime shifts for officers, indicating scrutiny of jail operations.
The sender requests confirmation of exact records for one mandated officer and another who worked five straight days of overtime, suggesting an internal review of staffing.
